sentences.sentence: In its second phase the company had positive results when testing their device for chronic rhinosinusitis with polyposis, chronic rhinosinusitis without polyposis and migraine therapies.
sentences.translation: 在第二个阶段的测试中公司得到了积极的结果，特别是在鼻窦炎和鼻息肉，慢性鼻窦炎和偏头痛等慢性病的治疗方面。

sentences.sentence: Methods: Analysing retrospectively 38 cases of polyposis coli patients who have accepted treatment in recently years.
sentences.translation: 方法对近年来收治结直肠息肉病38例的治疗进行了回顾性分析。

sentences.sentence: Objective To explore the preventive effect of Celecoxib on recurrence of the familial polyposis coli (FPC) after operation.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨塞莱昔布对家族性结肠息肉病病人术后的肠息肉的防治作用。
